.video-grid {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 15px;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 20px;
}

.video-card {
    position: relative;
    width: 180px;  /* Square size */
    height: 180px; /* Square shape */
    border-radius: 10px;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-align: center;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    transition: transform 0.3s;
    text-decoration: none;
    color: white;
}

.video-card img {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    filter: brightness(50%);  /* Darkens image for text readability */
}

.video-title {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); /* Dark overlay for better text contrast */
    color: white;
    padding: 10px;
    font-size: 14px;
    text-align: center;
    border-radius: 5px;
    width: 90%;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.video-card:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
}
